content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_projectDB;

   

SELECT
     LocationID, count(*) as counteachid
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
         FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) as result_set
group by LocationID
having count(*) > 1;
